name: Driving School Simulator
description: Buckle up, adjust your mirrors and get ready to put your driving abilities to the test as you prove your skills on the streets! Choose between driving a traditional car, bus, or truck and prepare to navigate city streets, mountain roads, or scenic highways.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 6800GT / AMD® Radeon™ HD 4650 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 560 / AMD® Radeon™ HD 6970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: It's a Simulator but... not in a good way.  The popins are bad, Cars appear out of nowhere. The controls... You're driving along, Make a slight turn and your car crashes because you couldn't control it.  All you do is drive and you gain XP for doing certain stuff. I'd only get this when it's cheap and you enjoy unlocking achievements.  Otherwise 'steer' clear of this game.
Controls do not work with Windows 10, at least when using keyboard/mouse.
This Game Has Some Weird Controls But After That Its Pretty Okay It Was On Sale For 5 Bucks So I Said Why Not. I enjoy This Game (When The Controls Work)
